title: 150-Year-Old Galapagos Tortoise Dies At San Diego Zoo
teaser: Speed, a 150-year-old Galapagos tortoise, has died at the San Diego Zoo. Tommy Owens, lead keeper at the zoo's reptile department, says Speed helped preserve his species and gave generations contact with a rare animal.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
